alert.note: Alert for Cass; Fulton; Miami (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:52AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Fulton, Cass and northwestern Miami Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1251 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Royal Center, or 7 miles northwest of Logansport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Logansport around 100 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Peru and Mexico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
